Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2010 07:27AM cosmo55 wrote: Hi there.  I had a mammogram last Saturday, my annual.  Well on Monday they called me to schedule me for additonal mammograms (true views?), an ultrasound and a spot press.  I called my doctor as they wouldn't tell me what they found.  The receptionist read my report and it is a 10mm assympetrical spot in my lower left quadrant of my left breast.  I'm a little nervous but we'll see what happens.  I was called back for additional mammograms before a long time ago...it turned out to be layering in my breast and that makes it hard for hte radiologist to see stuff.  I am hopeful that since it's so tiny it's nothing.  I'll be praying for you.
Posts.Title: Compression Mammo Tomorrow slg91324 Lisa1962
